rules: No personal insults, harrassment or overly vulgar language
Personal insults destroy the atmosphere of a healthy debate, and never result in anything but further escalating an exchange of words into a full-fledged argument.
No negative contributions in the form of trolling, overshitposting or spamming
This community aims to be a civil place of discussion. Users who negatively contribute to the conversation by trolling or constantly posting shitposts are not welcome.
No NSFW/NSFL content
We have younger members around, and therefore erotica, pornography and gore are not allowed.
No leaving the bounds of the rules list
There are only three rules for the time being. You should not seek more.
The rules list ended a rule ago
There really shouldn't be as many rules as you're seeking currently.
That's two warnings you've ignored
Why do you keep looking for more roles when there aren't that many?
Three time's the charm, I guess
Now that we've established that you're a rebel who does not back down, you're sure to continue, but rest assured that you will not find anything of substance further.
This was to be expected...
And indeed you are a rebel. Congratulations. I will save my breath and not tell you to turn back **this time**.
So how many rules have you conjured up so far?
'this time' does not count anymore, and so I swear I will say it: Turn back.
TURN BACK
We're at three warnings already, if we reach five, that's it.
You __will__ turn back
I'm going to warn you for the fourth and final time. TURN. BACK!
